蝸.definition: snail; Taiwan pr. [gua1]; see 蝸牛|蜗牛[wo1 niu2]

蝸居.definition: humble abode; to live (in a tiny, cramped space)

蝸桿副.definition: worm-gear pair; worm drive; worm and worm gear

蝸行.definition: to advance at a snail's pace

蝸行牛步.definition: lit. to crawl like a snail and plod along like an old ox (idiom); fig. to move at a snail's pace; to make slow progress
